LanguageData.SubWall_Changes: Changes made will immediately take effect on a map restart changing states of the walls.
LanguageData.SubWall_ticksToAction: Seconds for the wall to change state:
LanguageData.SubWall_powerAction: Power consumed while the walls are changing states:
LanguageData.SubWall_SubActionDesc: Submerge the selected walls, creating a passage through.
LanguageData.SubWall_MannedError: Requires a manned utility console! Utility Console is located in the Security Tab.
LanguageData.SubWall_RiseActionDesc: Surfaces the selected walls, blocking passage through.
